divs: Sighting DetailsI was at recess once and looked up to see what the weather was like and saw a small white object. I was suprised to see it. Then two other UFOs approcached the object. They seemed to dance together. Then made a maneuver that no other plane could do. It made a 90 degree turn without slowing down. During this time it was in triangular formation. To end the event it flew into a cloud bank
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tokyo
There were no other sightings in Tokyo on or around March 15th 2009
Summary: 3 disc shaped UFOs flyling in triangular formation
